primary_root_causes.issue: Chained unset bug: a = b =. assigns Null to a
primary_root_causes.description: Mathematica parses 'a = b =.' as 'a = (b =.)' which returns Null, so a = Null instead of being unset
primary_root_causes.impact: s = Null caused s[time] to become Null[time] in NDSolve → 222 NDSolve::nbnum1 errors
primary_root_causes.fix_applied: Changed 'a = b =.' to 'a =.; b =.;' for all chained unset patterns

primary_root_causes.description: timeGrowthCease was defined before dependencies (μ, Yield, ReferencepH) were fully evaluated, causing stale symbolic values to be baked into the cached definition
primary_root_causes.impact: timeGrowthCease[pH, so] returning $Failed cascaded to many downstream errors
primary_root_causes.fix_applied: Full notebook re-evaluation ensures correct definition order

primary_root_causes.description: txc is used to set axc, bxc, fgc, tkc but is never defined in v14_clean.nb
primary_root_causes.status: Previously documented - may already be fixed
primary_root_causes.impact: All color variables using txc will be undefined symbols instead of colors

root_cause_analysis.cascade_pattern: 222 NDSolve errors + 75 Table::iterb + 30 Infinity errors = ~327 errors from NDSolve failures alone (33% of all errors)
root_cause_analysis.reevaluation_notes: Error count unchanged after full re-evaluation. The chained unset syntax was fixed (41 =. operations properly separated), but errors persist. Root causes may include: (1) NDSolve parameter issues not solely from chained unset, (2) timeGrowthCease definition order, (3) other undefined symbols from dependency analysis (pH, t, Biomass have highest impact)

fixes_applied.fix: All chained unset patterns (4-var and 3-var chains)

recommended_fix_order: 2. [DONE] Identified stale cache issue - timeGrowthCease defined before dependencies ready
3. [PENDING] Full notebook re-evaluation to apply all fixes
4. Consider adding txc color variable if still missing
5. Track error count diff to verify progress
